website_summaries.verdict: While it may not have many standout bonus features, if you need a rock-solid air rifle that will survive the decades, this model is for you.
pros: Optimized for target shooting and pest control
cons: A little heavy for an air rifle

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic rifle...just not from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: My one star rating reflects the condition in which this arrived. Zero amazon shipping packaging...the rifle arrived in the beat up display box, with one small piece of styrofoam inside, and as a result, the rear open sight mount was damaged. Fortunately, this seems like it can be repaired, but it shouldnt need to be. The seller and/or Amazon, was careless in the handling and shipping of a firearm. Disappointed to say the least. That being said, you can’t go wrong with a Diana 34.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Jones

customer_reviews.title: I bought this rifle because of the great comments from reviews and the internet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this rifle because of the great comments from reviews and the internet. I you get one please clean out that barrel. Mine had a black looking residue in it. Next I mount a UTG scope and UTG compensator mount for 34 to help with barrel droop. I used two 1" scope rings as recommended by other air gunners. Tighten all the screw after applying blue lock tight. You will not be disappointed with this rifle. It sighted in beautifully after a two or three tries. RSW has build a great gun for a low price, I would recommend this rifle to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: To much droop with nothing available to compensate for the ...
customer_reviews.text: To much droop with nothing available to compensate for the rise when using a scope. I purchased a UTG 3-9x40 Varmint/Predrtor Scope with Pictinny/Weaver Rings $90 and a UTG Compensation Mount for RWS airguns with T06 trigger Model DNT06. This combination only allowed for shooting upto10 yard before running out of adjustment. Currently there isn't anything else on the market to provide additional rise. I would not purchase this airgun if you plan on using a scope.
customer_reviews.author: Bubba Chek

customer_reviews.title: RWS Rules
customer_reviews.text: This pellet gun is accurate and stays sighted. I have owned many pellet guns in the past of differing brands (Gamo, Crossman, Benjamin) and RWS is by far my favorite. The newer models have more plastic components, but the quality is still there. Very accurate, very reliable and very fun.
customer_reviews.author: IrieSide

customer_reviews.title: Great adult gun
customer_reviews.text: This is my first 'springer' pellet gun. Takes a little bit to get use too, but this is a great gun. I'm very happy with it. The .22 cal works really well on squirrels. I take this pellet gun hunting now, for the challenge.
customer_reviews.author: Schuyler Broadaway

customer_reviews.title: Pointing issues on the second replacement gun.  The back alignment has to be far out on horizontally
customer_reviews.text: Pointing issues on the second replacement gun. The back alignment has to be far out on horizontally it makes it awkward to shoot.
customer_reviews.author: teeter

customer_reviews.title: Great accuracy
customer_reviews.text: Very accurate...great grouping from 35 yds. All within a half inch. Way better than my Benjamin XL. The only complaint I have is with the spring, when cocking it doesn't sound right.
customer_reviews.author: Soul

customer_reviews.title: Better than advertised!
customer_reviews.text: This RWS Diana Model 24, .22 caliber from Uramex is even better than advertised. I put a 3-9x32 UTG Bug Buster atop the UTG compensation mount (10"), and she is a tack driving terrior for all small pests and predators within 30 yds. I bought this rifle based on the many positive reviews I read, and still my expectations have been vastly exceeded. Do yourself a favor and stop deliberating over saving a few bucks for lesser rifles. Get a Diana, and let your friends wonder why didn't. You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice sights. I use open sights
customer_reviews.text: My first RWS break barrel by Green Supply. Has power. Springer. Harder to cock then advertised. Accuracy can't say, haven't done a controlled test. Nice sights. I use open sights. Have to snug up screws after use. Good pellet rifle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surpassed my accuracy expectations
customer_reviews.text: So much better than the pellet rifle I had as a kid. Accuracy is great. Bought it to thin an over population of rabbits. Head shot from 20 yards drops them in their tracks.
customer_reviews.author: salmonator

customer_reviews.title: Not Disapointed, great gun
customer_reviews.text: Love this gun! So disappointed in my Benjamin being so inaccurate!
customer_reviews.author: Daryle D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shoulda purchased this rifle in the first place. very accurate, hope grinding stops when cocking
customer_reviews.author: scott young

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality. The force needed on the break barrel ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. The force needed on the break barrel pump was high. I am hoping that it will be much easier (as intended) once the rifle is broken in.
customer_reviews.author: Rod S.

customer_reviews.title: Use the irons or get a scope --- excellent springer
customer_reviews.text: More accurate than I can be, I was putting pellets into a single ragged hole at 25 yard with the iron sights. With a scope (UTG 4x32), it betters my abilities at 25 yard.
customer_reviews.author: REC

customer_reviews.title: RWS 34
customer_reviews.text: A little better quality than my Hatsan edge of the same caliber, but considering price it should be an "heirloom" rifle. Accuracy & power seem close to the Hatsan at close range. I added a WMX 3-9 "tactical" Chinese scope with laser, and used the To6 droop compensator, which barely allowed me to adjust the scope.  Time will tell about the gun's reliability and the scopes- right now they seem to work.
customer_reviews.author: Pro-ecotime

customer_reviews.title: Awesome air rifle!
customer_reviews.text: Great rifle. Heavy and well made. Very accurate. The trigger is a dream!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Miller

customer_reviews.title: Quality rifle!
customer_reviews.text: Looked at a lot of rifles prior to purchase, I'm very satisfied with this. It shoots great and has plenty of knock down power. Throw a scope on it and it a positive addition. Take care of this and it will last a life time plus. Shoot dozens of rounds through this before you judge it, the more I shot it the better it got. All together a superior rifle for the price. Yea, there's better ones out there if you want to spend $$ but for varmint control and plinking it can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: step

customer_reviews.title: Great quality rifle
customer_reviews.text: Great quality rifle. I had to take apart to loosen the bolt that cocks the rifle because it was so hard to compress the spring and return the barrel closed. It was necessary to use a power drill to loosen the bolt it was so tight. Now the rifle barrel can be closed with 1 to 2 fingers after compressing the spring, but make sure you use loctite to each bolt before reassembling. A little disappointed that this is so heavy. Would have selected another rifle had I researched the weight.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Massa

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it based on previous reviews.Already among my other .22 cal air rifles, this has already become my favorite. The trigger is so great that I purchased a replacement trigger for another of my rifles because of it. Accuracy is impressive right out of the box and the open sights needed very little adjustment to fit my shooting style. Overall, I'm very pleased with this air gun...
customer_reviews.author: Brent Moore

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very good air rifle, accurate right out of box, very well built
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not lube or oil in internal -spring...
customer_reviews.text: Got my 34 tonight. All pivots and spring are Dry..make a loud noise..where its the QC checking the products before leaving for customers ?
customer_reviews.author: jose moris

customer_reviews.title: Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional quality. I purchased a Benjamin 392 based off of a childhood brand loyalty and was surprised at how cheaply made and poorly performing it was. I replaced it with this model and couldn't be more impressed. The rifle feels as well made as my Ruger 10-22, and has really nice iron sights (the sights were laughably bad on the Benjamin).
customer_reviews.author: Dan Crow

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: One part fell off after only a few times of use, accuracy is similar with a $50 arigun.
customer_reviews.author: aggiebcs

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is a .22 cal RWS Model 34 and it has excellent accuracy and craftsmanship. A bit heavy but this does add to the solid feel of the rifle.Overall a very good value.
customer_reviews.author: Marion Dye

customer_reviews.title: so good! Shoots straight and is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! Shoots straight and is easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: A Young

customer_reviews.title: good enough for me
customer_reviews.text: hits beer cans at 50 yards with iron sights. good enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: K Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Excellent German-quality metal and wood and design
customer_reviews.text: Superb air rifle at a reasonable price. Excellent German-quality metal and wood and design.
customer_reviews.author: Boi Named Sous

customer_reviews.title: My Diana
customer_reviews.text: First air rifle so I did not know what to expect. I hadn't received my scope yet so I set a target up at 25 yards and put my first six shots in a 1 1/2" group with the great sights.
customer_reviews.author: william powell

customer_reviews.title: Super accurate, MUST lube and use proper scope mount
customer_reviews.text: Nail driving accuracy, right out of box. Really needs to be lubed, otherwise its 5 stars, so purchase the proper silicone based lube RWS offers for its rifles. If mounting scope, absolutely must use a compensating mount that either RWS offers, or UTG. I chose the UTG DT06 mount. Absolutely awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffh

customer_reviews.title: Pay the extra money for the Diana Model 34
customer_reviews.text: Owning this rifle made me relize how correct all the 5 star reviews are. I wanted an air rifle capable of repeatedly grouping shots close together from 25-30 yards. There are a lot of air rifles for less money but I sent 2 other rifles back prior to purchasing the Diana Model 34. I will hang on to this riffle for as long as it works. Spend the extra money for the Diana and you won't regret it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Nicer than I thought for a springer
customer_reviews.text: High quality workmanship that performs better than expected. Super nice! The stock is heavy and balanced for a good feel
customer_reviews.author: dmbrewski

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: As of yet, not as accurate as I have hoped
customer_reviews.author: don Messmer

customer_reviews.title: BROKEN
customer_reviews.text: When I got the package today, the box was rough. I opened it, and the stock is cracked at the forearm from the slot where the break-barrel goes back to the screw in the trigger guard. The packaging was terrible. I knew better than to order this online.
customer_reviews.author: Jim T

product_meta.title: Diana RWS Model 34 Break Barrel Hardwood Stock Pellet Gun Air Rifle
feature_bullets: Will keep you shooting accurately and powerfully for decades
A well-balanced hardwood stock makes it easy to hold and shoot
Includes fiber optic sights with a fully adjustable rear sight
Cocking is easy with just a 33-pound cocking weight
Shoots .22 caliber pellets at up to 800 fps

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
